institution-wrap.institution: National Institute of Allergy and Infectious Diseases
National Institute of General Medical Sciences

funding-group.funding-statement: Sanofi-Pasteur Laboratories (DNG25); National Institute of Allergy and Infectious Diseases (R37 AI032042) and National Institute of General Medical Sciences (U54 GM111274) from NIH financed this Project. The funders had no role in study design, data collection and analysis, decision to publish, or preparation of the manuscript.
